title: Rental in Las Vegas with right to purchase. Open house this Sat 8/6
posting_body: Great home located in Las Vegas with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths
Contact me to learn more about this innovative Lease with a Right to purchase program.
Unlike many lease to own programs, there is no obligation to buy and no non-refundable option fees.
There will be a live seminar on site a this property this weekend along with food, drinks, prizes and Q and A session!
45 Days from applying to move in day
*No history of eviction or other landlord issues
Listing and photos provided by BHHS Properties
Contact me today with more information!
